extension.title: Lightbox Extension
extension.label: Lightbox
extension.description: This extension contains functions for lightbox effects.

function.name: lightbox
function.description: Make an embedded image clickable so that it is shown in a lightbox frame.
function.param: URI for lightbox image. (default: same as thumb)
Title for thumbnail and lightbox images. (default: none)
Alternate text for thumbnail image. (default: none)
Width for thumbnail image. (default: original width of thumbnail image)
Height for thumbnail image. (default: original height of thumbnail image)
